title: How to Delete Roblox Chat History + Easy Workaround

steps.title: Open Roblox.
steps.content: Open Roblox. You can use the Roblox app for mobile or console, desktop application for PC, or in a web browser at https://www.roblox.com/ . If you aren't already logged into your Roblox account , do so now. You can only delete System Messages from Roblox. Regular messages can only be archived. Alternatively, you can temporarily block someone to hide the conversation.

steps.title: Select Connect.
steps.content: Select Connect . This is next to a speech bubble icon.

steps.title: Select Chats.
steps.content: Select Chats . This is next to Groups . You'll see a list of all active chats.

steps.title: Select the message.
steps.content: Select the message. You should see options appear.

steps.title: Select Delete.
steps.content: Select Delete . This option will only show if you selected a System Message. Alternatively, select Archive to archive a user message. This will move the message out of your main inbox and into the Archive section.

steps.title: Navigate to the user's profile page.
steps.content: Navigate to the user's profile page. While you can't completely delete user messages from your account, you can hide a conversation by temporarily blocking the user. This will remove the chat from your inbox.

steps.title: Select ••• .
steps.content: Select ••• . This is in the corner of the page.

steps.title: Select Block User.
steps.content: Select Block User . The user will be blocked, and the conversation will be removed from your inbox. If you want to access the conversation again, you'll just need to unblock the user .
